metadata.title: CVE-2024-37147 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is an open-source asset and IT management software package thatprovides ITIL Service Desk features, licenses tracking and softwareauditing. An authenticated user can attach a document to any item, even ifthe user has no write access on it. Upgrade to 10.0.16.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
